response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. I am offering this exceptional piece to you at a special price of $900,000, which represents a substantial discount compared to its true worth. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you would like to arrange a viewing of the product. I am confident that you will find its value exceeds the investment by a considerable margin. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 900000}
